text:
Andromium | SF | LA - http://getsuperbook.com. Andromium Inc. is building a future where the only computer you'll need is your smartphone.

To date, our Kickstarter has raised $1.3M with 18 days to go.

We're looking for experienced Android developers interested in being founding engineers on our team to help build the future of computing. We're HQ'ed in San Francisco, but are happy to work with remote / LA-based folks.

Contact andrew@andromiumos.com if interested
